コロナワクチンが体に悪い？

Translated:
Is the corona vaccine bad for you?

Even if you compete for the probability of dying from a meteorite falling and the probability of dying from being hit by lightning, isn't it a world of ``bad boogers''?

In the end, vaccines, corona, and life expectancy won't change to die someday.

Tweet:
新型コロナウイルスに感染して、多分一番ストレスのかからない方法。

・症状が出たら家に帰る
・コールドクターなどの往診サービスアプリをスマホにダウンロード
・名前、住所、スマホ電話番号、保険証、クレジットカードを登録
・アプリから往診依頼
↓
Translated:
Probably the least stressful way to get infected with the new coronavirus.

- Go home if symptoms occur
・ Download a home visit service app such as a call doctor to your smartphone
・ Register your name, address, smartphone phone number, insurance card, and credit card
・ Request a home visit from the app
↓

Corona Diary ~July 24th~
It's been a week since the sore throat. Generally, I spend the whole day doing nothing (lol), focusing on YouTube and TV. I want to go to a convenience store at least. I'm starting to get stressed😢

Tweet: For youthを聴いていて、”If I never met you “って歌詞を改めてみてふと思ったのだけれど、もしバンタンに出逢ってなかったらどうなっていたんだろう。仕事のことでひたすら悩んでストレスを抱えてて、さらにコロナでなかなか友達にも会えなくて、何もかもが不確かで不透明だった頃。そんな時たまたま
Translated: When I was listening to For youth, I revisited the lyrics “If I never met you” and suddenly thought, what would have happened if I hadn't met Bangtan. She was worried and stressed about her work, and it was difficult to see her friends because of Corona, so everything was uncertain and unclear. At that time, by chance

Tweet:
コロナって、感染しなくても世界的にたくさんの影響を振り撒いて、国家も自治体も家庭も個人も全てにストレスと変化をもたらしてるよね。
制限される事はとても苦痛、自然にため息が出てたり、イライラしたり、鬱になったり。
他人に構う余裕すら無い。
平和なあの頃に戻れるのかな？
Translated:
Corona spreads a lot of influence around the world even if it is not infected, and it brings stress and changes to all nations, local governments, families, and individuals.
Being restricted is very painful, naturally sighing, irritated, depressed.
I can't even afford to care about others.
Can we go back to those peaceful days?
